FuncDef: This command defines the peer endpoint ID of the SAP or spoke-SDP parent-aa-sub of the AARP peer.
CLIs: peer-endpoint sap <sap-id> encap-type { dot1q | null | qinq }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
Specifies the spoke SDP ID and VC ID. Values-1 to 32767.
